item.title: Discord notifications: Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr
item.description: Part 1 of a Discord notifications series. I’ve had this running for a while and it works flawlessly, I’m very pleased with it. After having a few people ask me how it’s done I decided it’d be best to make a post. This is made extremely simple thanks to Sonarr’s built-in support for Slack notifications and Discord’s built-in support for Slack webhooks. Of course Radarr and Lidarr support this too, as they are forks of Sonarr.
